name: Unilovel
description:
Aha! Can you repeat it again - is it a PUZZLE with elements of a visual novel, or a novel with elements of a puzzle?

No, this is exactly a puzzle. And despite the fact that you can skip levels here, it is DIFFICULT puzzle. But we are confident that you can handle it. Do you like puzzles?

We also worked on the visual part. Our senior programmer says that the girls are just top, very beautiful. We tried our best!

Immerse yourself in a wonderful world ... or as they usually write, when they want to sell something.

Well, in general, ray tracing was not delivered again, but at least you can get pleasure from anti alazing :)
